sentence.Network_en: It was time to consign his bat and glove to the cupboard.
sentence.Network_cn: 该把他的球棒和手套搁进柜子里了。

sentence.Network_en: Consign these goods to Warner and Smith by express.
sentence.Network_cn: 把这批货用快车运交华纳和史密斯.

sentence.Network_en: We cannot agree to consign the goods.

【货代知识】货代常用英文缩写 ... 发货地国家 country of delivery 发货通知书 consignment note 费用已付 charges paid.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'mark with the sign of the cross', especially at baptism or confirmation, as a sign of dedication to God): from French consigner or Latin consignare 'mark with a seal'

entry.def: To consign something or someone to a place where they will be forgotten about, or to an unpleasant situation or place, means to put them there.

example.ex: For decades, many of Malevich's works were consigned to the basements of Soviet museums...
example.tran: 马列维奇的很多作品在苏联博物馆的地下室里堆了几十年。

example.ex: It was time to consign his bat and glove to the cupboard...
example.tran: 该把他的球棒和手套搁进柜子里了。

means.word_mean: 2. give over to another for care or safekeeping;

auth_sentence.content: Consign yourself to the hangman if you must.
auth_sentence.res_content: Consign yourself to the hangman if you must.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Consign yourself to the hangman if you must.

auth_sentence.content: Defeat will almost certainly consign them to the lottery of the play-offs.
auth_sentence.res_content: Defeat will almost certainly consign them to the lottery of the play-offs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Defeat will almost certainly consign them to the lottery of the play-offs.

auth_sentence.content: He must therefore consign this wretched report to the legislative dustbin where it belongs.
auth_sentence.res_content: He must therefore consign this wretched report to the legislative dustbin where it belongs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He must therefore consign this wretched report to the legislative dustbin where it belongs.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =mark,表示"记号,信号,标志"; 2. 签署

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有意义的;重大的,重要的
stems_affixes.word_buile: significance[[n.意义,含义;重要性,重要的]]→adj.有意义的;重大的,重要的
in内部+sign记号,信号,标志+ia状态→内部标志

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分配,指派;[指定的]作业,[分派的]任务
stems_affixes.word_buile: assign派给,分配+ment表名词→n.分配,指派;[指定的]作业,[分派的]任务
consign[v.托运,托人看管]+ment表名词→n.托运,寄售
de加强+sign记号→做好记号→设计
designate[v.指明,指出;任命,指派]+ion表名词→designation指定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 旗, 军舰旗, 军旗, 徽章,舰旗[船上表示所属国家的旗帜]
stems_affixes.word_buile: en内部+sign记号,信号,标志→内部标志
resign[v.辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从]+ation表名词→n.放弃,辞职,反抗
sign记号,信号,标志→n.符号；手势；征兆，迹象 v. 签名；作手势
sign记号,信号,标志+al→n.信号,暗号 v.发信号,用信号通知
sign记号,信号,标志+ature表名词→记号的东西→签名
sign记号,信号,标志+et做记号→图章

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意义,含义;重要性,重要的
stems_affixes.word_buile: signifi=signify[v.表示,意味;要紧,有重要性]+cance→n.意义,含义;重要性,重要的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 派给,分配;选定,指定[时间,地点等]
stems_affixes.word_buile: as加强+sign签署→指定
de加强+sign记号→做好记号→设计
de加强+sign记号+ate表动词→指定记号→指定,指明
con共同+sign记号,信号,标志→共同做记号→把……委托给别人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+sign签署→v.辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从
sign记号,信号,标志→n.符号；手势；征兆，迹象 v. 签名；作手势
sign记号,信号,标志+al→n.信号,暗号 v.发信号,用信号通知

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使著名, 使显著, 使显眼, 向……发信号
stems_affixes.word_buile: signal信号+ize表动词→发信号
sign记号,信号,标志+et做记号→图章

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表示,意味;要紧,有重要性
stems_affixes.word_buile: sign记号,信号,标志+ify……化→用信号表示→象征

sentences.en: The goods were consigned to you by railway.
sentences.cn: 货物已由铁路托运到你处。

means.word_mean: 把…托付给, 把…交付给

sentences.en: The captured rebels were consigned to the dungeons.
sentences.cn: 抓到的叛乱分子被送进了地牢。

means.word_mean: 丟弃，拋弃(人或物)；把…搁置一旁

sentences.en: She consigned his letter to the waste basket.
sentences.cn: 她把他的信丟进废纸篓。

sentences.en: They can’t just consign me to the scrap heap because I’m over fifty!
sentences.cn: 他们不能因为我超过五十岁就弃我不顾！

means.word_mean: 把…置于(令人不快的境地)；打发；发落

sentences.en: Orphaned children were consigned to institutions.
sentences.cn: 孤儿都打发到了福利院。
